listNav.platformName:
IRA SKILL VARASITY
EDUCATIONAL & CAREER DEVELOPMENT PLATFORM
listNav.abutPlatform: IRA Skill Varsity is an educational and career development platform initiated under the leadership of IRA Educational and Welfare Society (est. 2015) and IRA Consultancy and Research Pvt Ltd (est. 2023). With a focus on transforming lives through quality education, practical skills, and employability training, IRA Skill Varsity operates across the educational spectrumâ€”from early childhood education to college-level job readiness programs.

achievements.achieveAbout:
12,000+ students trained across Andhra Pradesh, Telangana,Karnataka, and Tamil Nadu
1,000+ candidates placed through 100+ institutional collaborations with engineering, degree, and management colleges
Presence in both urban and rural learning environments
Successful implementation of multiple CSR-funded and government-sponsored projects
achievements.achieveAbout2:
Successful implementation of multiple CSR-funded and government-sponsored projects
In-college delivery aligned with academic calendars
Real-time reporting and placement tracking
Outcome-based training with certification and assessment

opportunity_IRA.optAbout: Dynamic experiential opportunities plus high starting salaries add up to significant outcomes for Illinois Tech graduates.

academic.acaAbout: IRA Skill Varsity focuses on skilling, upskilling, and employability training across colleges and communities. With state-wide presence and pan-India aspirations, the organization conducts industry-relevant programs that enhance both technical and soft skills.

programAcademic.programName: CRM Tools and Customer Service Skills
